text: Amazing place! Had such a fun time playing board games and there were so much variety! The staff was very friendly and explained a lot of the rules and the price is very affordable!!!!

My peers and I had a blast playing the wide variety of board games in stall for the public. The dude on duty was also forthcoming as he put in effort to explain the games in a precise and engaging manner. Other than that, our experience with darts was overall pleasant too. Therefore itâ€™s a no brainer for a five star review.

A really comfortable environment with super friendly staff! The cafe has a HUGE collection of games, was genuinely impressed by the variety of games available. A full day of game play is just $10.90 so rly worth the price u pay!
The board games were fun, the variety of games are very wide too. The staff was very friendly and the instructions given were very clear. Very affordable price for full day play $10.90

I and my friends had a great time playing the board games, with the assistance of the super friendly staff who helped teach us the ropes to the game that we didn't understand. Allowing for an overall enjoyable experience.
